display_long_description:
Lumbara AgriVR - Complete Agricultural Learning Platform

  Experience realistic farming in VR! Step into an immersive agricultural arena with outdoor classroom, experimental
  plots, and professional machinery.

  🌱 Key Features

  - Interactive Tools - Magnifier, microscope, camera, knife, planter, sprayer, soil probes
  - Realistic Crops - Corn, wheat, soybean, sunflower with BBCH growth stages
  - Disease Detection - Identify rust, pests, aphids using professional diagnostic tools
  - Collaborative Learning - Multiplayer sessions with teachers and classmates
  - Hands-on Activities - Plant crops, take samples, prepare spray solutions, answer questionnaires

  🎯 Perfect For

  Agricultural students and educators seeking practical, risk-free training in modern farming techniques.

  💡 Why Choose VR?

  - Practice year-round regardless of season
  - Safe experimentation with expensive equipment
  - Immediate visual feedback on farming decisions
  - Access to diverse crop diseases and growth stages
